sections.heading: Overview
content: Teri Gardner has been an administrative dietitian in healthcare for more than seven years. She has also been a nutrition and fitness consultant in weight management for 17 years, including 15 years as an aerobic instructor certified by the National Dance Exercise Instructor's Training Association. Teri has provided services to the American Diabetes Association, Weight Watchers, the Juvenile Diabetes Association, and TOPS, and has provided online weight management services to CBS HealthWatch and Medscape. She has been a member of the American Dietetic Association for 20 years and holds their Certificate of Training in Adult Weight Management.
